summary: SCREAMEME - The New Memecoin Giving Holders What They Deserve - Our token is set up to ensure all of our holders are rewarded. Our rewards are all paid out in Eth to ensure the longevity of the chart and the project. The longer you hold the more ETH you gain. Our unique contract has a dynamic tax setting that will buy back tokens on the chart through the sell taxes and burn tokens. Forever supporting the chart and the holders. Our contract is deflationary. Sellers will help to burn more and more supply ensuring our holders will benefit from holding the token and earning those rewards. Sellers help the holders.
